page.title: 03Lound Village,Notts.
page.content: Lound is a village with a road right through it and houses on each side. It has a pub called the Blue Bell and a village hall that was made from a chapel. It has a playing field and going down the road there are old people's flats where they can ring a bell if they need help and a warden will come. There is a Sub-Post Office and it is open every day except Sunday. They sell food and sweets. In the joiner's shop they make things to do with wood. There are lots of old houses that they are doing up. Most of them are painted white now as the bricks are too old. About 4OO people live in Lound. There is a small chapel and a small church,which is only open one Sunday a month. A man in the village makes fences.
